No employees.
No VA.
Just me + AI tools.

• Claude writes blogs

3/5 Customer Service (20h → 2h)

• Auto-responses to FAQs
• Smart routing to me only when needed

• Zapier automates workflows
• AI handles data entry
• Auto-invoice processing

• 35h/week saved
• K/mo cost
• 5K/mo revenue increase

ROI: 500%
